FEEDBACK_FORUM_LINK_1: Feel free to ask questions and interact with us
FEEDBACK_KNOWN_ISSUES_1: Check out our documentation, knowledge base, videos etc.
DATAGRID_PARAMETERS_GEAR: Click here to edit the datagrid parameters (encoding, separator, etc.)
ONBOARDING: Click here to discover the application
SELECT_DATASET_DESCRIPTION: Select a dataset or a folder to access its details
DATASET_DETAILS: owned by {{author}}, created {{created | TDPMoment}}, contains {{records}} line(s)
SEARCH_DATASET_DETAILS: Home/{{path}}, owned by {{author}}, created {{created | TDPMoment}}, contains {{records}} line(s)
SEARCH_PREPARATION_DETAILS: owned by {{author}}, created {{creationDate | TDPMoment}}, contains {{steps.length-1}} step(s)
UPLOAD_ERROR: An error occurred during file upload
APPLY_PREPARATION_ON_ANOTHER_DATASET: Apply this preparation on another dataset
REPLACE_EXISTING_DATASET: Choose a dataset to replace the existing one:
NO_COMPATIBLE_DATASETS: There are no compatible datasets to preparation: {{name}}
REPLACE_EXISTING_DATASET: Replace the existing dataset with a compatible one
ENTER_PREPARATION_NAME: Enter a name for your preparation
NB_LINES_MATCHING_FILTERS: {{percentage}}% of lines are matching your filter(s)
EXPORT_FILENAME: Name of the generated export file:
NO_FUNCTION: No function for the current selection
DELETE_PERMANENTLY: You are going to permanently delete the {{type}} "{{name}}".
NO_UNDONE_CONFIRM: This operation cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?
DELETE_STEP: You are going to remove this action: "{{action}}" on "{{column}}".
DELETE_STEP_CASCADE_MODE_WARNING: WARNING: All the actions from the selected one to the end will be removed in this mode. If this is not what you want, try to remove a single action instead.
REMOVE_LAST_STEP_FILTER_CONTENT: This action is not supported as it would remove all the lines.
UPDATE_EXISTING_DATASET: Do you want to overwrite the existing "{{dataset}}" dataset?
CHOOSE_SEPARATOR: Which character do you want to use as a delimiter?
INVALID_DATASET: This dataset is not valid. Please import a correct CSV file to overwrite the data.
PLAYGROUND_FILE_NOT_FOUND: The {{type}} with this id does not exist or is not accessible.
PREPARATION_STEP_DELETE_MODE_NOT_AUTHORI: This action cannot be deleted because some following actions depends on it.
GENERIC_ERROR: Sorry an unexpected error occurred and we could not complete your last operation, but you can keep using Data Preparation.
UNSUPPORTED_CONTENT: Unable to create the dataset: the content is not supported. Try with a CSV or XSL file.
DATASET_NAME_ALREADY_USED: This Dataset name is already used by an other dataset
DATE_FORMAT_ERROR: This must be a date in the 'DD/MM/YYYY hh:mm:ss' format.
SELECT_COLUMN_TO_DISPLAY_ACTIONS: Select a column to display its actions
SELECT_LINE_TO_DISPLAY_ACTIONS: Select a line to display its actions
SEARCH: Search Talend Data Preparation and Documentation
APPLY_TO_ALL_CELLS: Apply to all cells with this value
NO_ADVANCED_CHART: No advanced chart for the current selection
SELECT_COLUMN_TO_DISPLAY_STATS: Select a column to display its statistics
CHOOSE_PREPARATION_TO_APPLY: Choose a preparation to apply to this dataset
NO_COMPATIBLE_PREPARATIONS: There are no compatible preparations to dataset: {{name}}
SAVE_CHANGE: Do you want to save your changes?
SAVE_CHANGE_DESCRITION_1: You've transformed your dataset in a preparation that can be saved in order to be re-used later.
SAVE_CHANGE_DESCRITION_2: Do you want to save it?
SELECT_VALID_RECORDS: Select lines with valid values for
SELECT_INVALID_RECORDS: Select lines with invalid values for
SELECT_EMPTY_RECORDS: Select lines with empty values for
FILL_EMPTY_WITH_TOP_VALUE: Fill empty values with top adjacent value
FILL_EMPTY_WITH_BOTTOM_VALUE: Fill empty values with bottom adjacent value
REPLACE_INVALID_WITH_TOP_VALUE: Replace invalid values with top adjacent value
REPLACE_INVALID_WITH_BOTTOM_VALUE: Replace invalid values with bottom adjacent value
LOOKUP_STEPS_1: 1. Select two identical columns from two different datasets to link them. These columns turn blue.
LOOKUP_STEPS_2: 2. Check "Add to Dataset" to select the columns you want to associate with the linked columns.
LOOKUP_STEPS_3: 3. Place your mouse over the "Confirm" button to preview the result.
ADD_LOOKUP_DATASET_MODAL_TITLE: Select dataset(s) to add to lookup
ADD_DATASET_TO_PERFORM_A_LOOKUP: Add a dataset by cliking on "+" button to perform a lookup
UPGRADE_VERSION_NEW_VERSION: There is a new version of Talend Data Preparation Free Desktop available: {{version}}.
UPGRADE_VERSION_RELEASE_NOTES: Check out the release notes for improvements and changes.
UPGRADE_VERSION_DOWNLOAD: To upgrade, go to the download page on the Talend web site and install the new version.
